content.text:
# Czech Republic national korfball team

| IKF rank= 6 (Jan.2025)
| World championships apps=6
| World championships first=1995
| World championships best=3rd place, 2003, 2007
| World games apps=5
| World games first=2005
| World games best=3rd place, 2005
| European championships apps=7
| European championships first=1998
| European championships best=Runners-up, 2002
| website=http://www.korfbal.cz
}}
The Czech Republic national korfball team is managed by the Czech Korfball Association (CKA), representing the Czech Republic in korfball international competitions.
